name: Programmer Dater
description:
There are programmers all over the map, high and low!

You are tasked with finding partners for zealous programmers. Go up to them, grab them, and shoot them into a dating partner! Make 4 couples and the title of Programmer Dater is yours! 

Can you succeed before the time runs out!?

How to Play:

Grab one of the Programmers and throw it into another one to make a couple. Make 4 couples and you win, run out of time and you lose.

WASD - Movement

Left Click (Hold) - Pick-up Programmer

Left Click (Release) - Throw Programmer

Space - Jump

Github link:

https://github.com/AnimaticDude/GD205

Contributors: Jay Chaparro

Assets Used:

Rocks and Boulders 2/3DVoxel_Free/Rocky Hills Environment/HQ Laptop/Security Systems/Clock - Unity Asset Store

Sound Design and BGM:

Jay Chaparro OST
